name: Little Green Ghouls, Buddy
description:
It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia has been one of my favorite shows for years. I quote it all the time and unintentionally find real world connections to old episodes at a rate that must annoy my friends.

Today I quoted a line from "The Waitress Is Getting Married" for no reason. I simply said, "Little green ghouls, buddy." Thus, the dumb idea for this very very short game was made.

And now the game exists. Hope you like the Always Sunny easter eggs and get a break from the dumpster fire that is 2020 for a couple of minutes.

- Chris

xoxo
